gradle/org.gradle.api.artifacts.dsl/DependencyModifier

DependencyModifier

@Incubating
@NonExtensible
abstract class DependencyModifier(source)

A DependencyModifier defines how to modify a dependency inside a custom dependencies block to select a different variant.

Since

8.0

Inheritors

TestFixturesDependencyModifier
PlatformDependencyModifier
EnforcedPlatformDependencyModifier

Modifies a dependency to select the variant of the given module.
